# contextualStrings

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of supplemental vocabulary words grouped by tag.

## Declaration

```swift
final var contextualStrings: [AnalysisContext.ContextualStringsTag : [String]] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use the tag to easily swap out some of the strings while leaving others in place. The framework provides a predefined [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/AnalysisContext/ContextualStringsTag/general] tag.

## Providing textual context

- **AnalysisContext.ContextualStringsTag**
title: contextualStrings
